lead_paragraph: Fabio Porfirio Lobo, the son of a former Honduran president, appeared in Federal District Court in Manhattan on Friday on a charge of conspiring to import cocaine into the United States.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Honduras: Ex-President’s Son Arrested

snippet: Fabio Porfirio Lobo, the son of a former Honduran president, appeared in Federal District Court in Manhattan on Friday on a charge of conspiring to import cocaine into the United States.
abstract: Federal authorities have charged Fabio Porfirio Lobo, son of former Honduran Pres Porfirio Lobo, with conspiring to import cocaine to the United States.
